about_the_game:
Roundscape Adorevia is a turn-based 2D adult RPG that draws inspiration from classic RPGs, with a strong emphasis on customization. Players can choose not only their gender but also their origin. Featuring over 2 million written words in dialogue, dozens of significant choices, and multiple endings, Roundscape Adorevia offers a deeply personal gaming experience.

SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE

Roundscape Adorevia features over 250 CG adult scenes, created by a variety of talented artists. As one of the largest Western erotic games, it offers something for every enthusiast. Do you want to build your own harem? Are you interested in sharing your partners? Or perhaps play through the game as a virgin? In Roundscape Adorevia, the choice is yours. Every erotic scene is optional.

YOUR STORY. YOUR COMPANIONS

Choose your gender and origin from six distinct options: Farmer, Noble, Thief, Soldier, Templar, or Mage. Each origin provides unique content and characters. Recruit 12 unique companions, each with their own personality, companion quests, and lewd scenes. Your choices may even influence the personalities of some companions.

(EVEN MORE) EXOTIC LOCATIONS AND CHARACTERS

The Steam version of Roundscape includes all released updates and add-ons, and is fully uncensored. Obtain your own ship in Vesper's Booty and explore the seas. Assist a wild Minotaur tribe at Emek's Rest, save the holy city of Vesunna, or uncover the mystery of the snowy kingdom of Tilan.

THIS IS MY CASTLE

Obtain your very own castle. Build new rooms, upgrade your fortress, and customize its style. Unlock new buildings, start a brothel, and recruit characters to work there. These optional gameplay elements allow you to advance at your own pace and according to your desires.

FUN FAST COMBAT

Over 20 different classes to unlock and more than 300 items to discover. Mix two classes to create a unique play style. Enhance weapons and armor with over 40 different gems for unique effects. Combat in Roundscape is designed to be fun and occasionally a bit silly, we're here for the sexy action, not slow combat.

MORALITY AND CORRUPTION

Inspired by classic RPGs, you will often encounter decisions that impact the fate of characters or entire locations. Will you become a shining hero, an evil tyrant, or something in between? Your choices unlock new content and paths, offering a lot of replayability. The average single playthrough of Roundscape can range from 20 to 60 hours.
